doc.content:
Miss North Carolina thinks that you should eat more broccoli and steer clear of cigarettes and alcohol.
Kirstin Elrod - her first name is pronounced keer-sten - graduated from the N.C. School of the Arts in May and was crowned 2004 Miss North Carolina in June. ... "I'm a vegetarian," Elrod said. "I love doing yoga, and I do that as often as I can."
